name: Undead Blackout
description:
Undead Blackout is a top-down shooter which sees you battling hordes of the Undead while shrouded in darkness with only your torch and the occasional shaft of moonlight to illuminate your surroundings.

Story
You are Ella Romero, a former Army Officer who is desperately trying to reach the safety of a nearby bunker before the Air Force pound the local area with everything they have got as a desperate last attempt to stop the Undead from spreading across the country.

Features
  • Challenging gameplay. You will die a lot.
  • Two-Player split-screen co-op.
  • 6 levels to beat in the main Arcade mode then a challenging Survival mode give you hours of Undead carnage.
  • 6 levels to beat in the main Arcade mode then a challenging Survival mode give you hours of Undead carnage.
  • Every game poses a different challenge thanks to random placement of keys, ammo and weapons
  • Feeling competitive? Try Versus Mode - you against your friend to see he can survive the longest. Will you get to them first or will the Undead?
  • Challenging gameplay. You will die a lot.
  • Dynamic soundtrack from Edeji

*Please note TWO CONTROLLERS are required for the two-player modes.*
